deem.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to think of something in a particular way or as having a particular quality
deem.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: They were told to take whatever action they deemed necessary.
They deemed that he was no longer capable of managing the business.
They were deemed to be illegal immigrants.
UK plans were deemed to infringe EU law.
deem.translation[0].note_box[0].items[0]: Deem is not used in the progressive You say
He deems it his duty to report the incident
He is deeming it his duty to report the incident
